title: Apple Q1 earnings: The company needs to tell 'the right story'
title_zh: 苹果第一季度收益：该公司需要讲述“正确的故事”
summary: Apple (AAPL) is reporting first quarter earnings results on Thursday after markets close.Creative Strategies CEO and principal analyst Ben Bajarin joins Market Domination host Josh Lipton to discuss his expectations for the upcoming earnings print.To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination.
summary_zh: 苹果公司 (AAPL) 将于周四收盘后公布第一季度财报。Creative Strategies 首席执行官兼首席分析师 Ben Bajarin 与 Market Domination 主持人 Josh Lipton 一起讨论了他对即将发布的财报的预期。要观看有关最新市场行为的更多专家见解和分析，请查看更多 Market Domination 内容。

title: Samsung profit triples but sees chip shortage continuing
title_zh: 三星利润增加两倍但芯片短缺持续
summary:
STORY: Samsung Electronics is forecasting a chip shortage will worsen this year driven by the AI boom.

The South Korean company on Thursday said its operating profit more than tripled to a record high in the fourth quarter.

It underscores the strong pricing power of the world's top memory chipmaker, as the race to build artificial intelligence strains chip supply and boosts prices.

With Apple and Samsung as customers its shares fell 1.2% after a sharp rally this year.

The company expected any expansion of memory chip supply to be limited in 2026 and 2027 while AI-related demand remains strong.

Operating profit at Samsung's chip business, its main cash cow, surged 470% to a record high $11.4 billion in the fourth quarter from a year earlier.

In contrast, its mobile profit declined by 10% to $1.3 billion, squeezed by the surging chip prices.

The company's mobile and display businesses warned of a "challenging year" as they face cost pressures from memory price hikes.

Samsung said it is already producing its next-generation high-bandwidth memory (HBM) chips, or HBM4.

It plans to ship them in February at the request of a "major customer," apparently referring to Nvidia.
summary_zh:
故事：三星电子预计，在人工智能蓬勃发展的推动下，今年的芯片短缺将进一步恶化。

这家韩国公司周四表示，第四季度的营业利润增长了两倍多，创历史新高。

这突显了世界顶级存储芯片制造商强大的定价能力，因为人工智能的竞争导致芯片供应紧张并推高了价格。

随着苹果和三星作为客户，其股价下跌经过今年的大幅上涨后，该公司预计存储芯片供应的扩张将在 2026 年和 2027 年受到限制，而人工智能相关的需求仍然强劲。

三星主要摇钱树芯片业务的营业利润在第四季度同比飙升 470%，达到创纪录的 114 亿美元。

相比之下，其移动利润下降了 10%，达到 1.2%。 13亿美元，受到芯片价格飙升的挤压

title: Bank of England outlines UK stablecoin and tokenisation plan
title_zh: 英格兰银行概述英国稳定币和代币化计划
summary: The Bank of England has set out plans to accelerate tokenisation and regulated stablecoins in UK financial markets.
summary_zh: 英国央行已制定计划，加速英国金融市场的代币化和监管稳定币。

title: Stock market today: Dow, S&P 500, Nasdaq futures rise as Tesla, Meta, Microsoft diverge after earnings
title_zh: 今日股市：道指、标准普尔 500 指数、纳斯达克期货上涨，特斯拉、Meta、微软财报后走势分化
summary: Wall Street is in the middle of Big Tech earnings, with Apple the next 'Magnificent Seven' member set to report.
summary_zh: 华尔街正处于大型科技公司财报的中期，苹果公司将成为下一个“七巨头”的成员。

title: Tesla earnings call: Musk explains 'amazing abundance' mission
title_zh: 特斯拉财报电话会议：马斯克解释“惊人的丰富”使命
summary: Tesla (TSLA) released fourth quarter results after Wednesday's market close, reporting adjusted earnings of $0.50 per share compared to estimates of $0.45 and revenue of $24.90 billion versus estimates of $25.11 billion.In Wednesday's earnings call, Tesla CEO Elon Musk explained the reasoning behind the company's new mission statement: "amazing abundance."Watch the video above to hear more.To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out Yahoo Finance.
summary_zh: 特斯拉 (TSLA) 在周三收盘后发布了第四季度业绩，报告调整后每股收益为 0.50 美元，而预期为 0.45 美元；收入为 249 亿美元，而预期为 251.1 亿美元。在周三的财报电话会议上，特斯拉首席执行官埃隆·马斯克解释了公司新使命宣言背后的原因：“惊人的丰富。”观看上面的视频以了解更多信息。要观看更多关于最新市场行为的专家见解和分析，请查看雅虎财经。

title: Earnings live: IBM stock surges, Whirlpool slides; Meta, Microsoft, Tesla report beats across the board
title_zh: 实时财报：IBM 股价飙升，惠而浦股价下跌； Meta、微软、特斯拉的报告全面领先
summary: The fourth quarter earnings season kicks into high gear this week, with Big Tech results from Microsoft, Meta, Tesla, and Apple headlining the earnings calendar.
summary_zh: 第四季度财报季本周进入高潮，微软、Meta、特斯拉和苹果等大型科技公司的业绩成为财报日历的头条新闻。

title: Stock market today: S&P 500 slips from record as Fed stands pat, Nasdaq rises before Big Tech earnings flurry
title_zh: 今日股市：美联储按兵不动，标普 500 指数从历史高位下滑，纳斯达克指数在大型科技公司盈利波动之前上涨
summary: The Fed's rate decision and 'Magnificent Seven' earnings from Microsoft, Meta, and Tesla are in focus.
summary_zh: 美联储的利率决定以及微软、Meta 和特斯拉的“七大”财报成为焦点。

title: Labor market has been adjusting to being in 'shock-prone world'
title_zh: 劳动力市场一直在适应“容易受到冲击的世界”
summary: Amazon (AMZN) plans to layoff an additional 16,000 corporate workers — now totaling 30,000 positions cut by the e-commerce giant since October 2025 — as part of the company's latest push to adopt AI and "[remove] bureaucracy" to increase efficiency.As earnings season kicks into full swing for Big Tech companies, Deutsche Bank chief global strategist Binky Chadha takes an extensive look at the performance of the US labor market coming out of the pandemic and President Trump's own "Liberation Day" tariff policies.Amazon is scheduled to report earnings next week on Thursday, February 5.To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Morning Brief.
summary_zh: 亚马逊 (AMZN) 计划再裁员 16,000 名企业员工——自 2025 年 10 月以来，这家电子商务巨头总共裁减了 30,000 个职位——作为该公司最新推动采用人工智能和“消除官僚作风”以提高效率的一部分。随着大型科技公司的财报季节全面展开，德意志银行首席全球策略师 Binky Chadha 广泛审视了美国劳动力市场的表现疫情和特朗普总统自己的“解放日”关税政策。亚马逊定于下周 2 月 5 日星期四公布收益。要观看更多关于最新市场行为的专家见解和分析，请查看更多早间简报。
